channel.title: Need help with my server
channel.description:
since i got my pimpscape server source i have been playing it but i had many things i have wanted to do like:
-pk zone. -make admin-mod bases. -have people join my server. -how to make walls and doors. -make a new training spot. -how to change my pimpscape to different name.
and i know how to make people go to my bases but it doesnt work i dont know my router and when i go on address bar and type 192.168.1.1 or 192.168.2.1 it never works i dont know whats wronge mostly i want to have people join my server and make admin spots and mod spots and deffinetly change pimpscape to a different name because when ever i logg on to my server it says welcome to PimpScape and i want it to say a different thing.
so if anyone can help please help plz im new i can logg on to my server well its actually pimpscape server and it lets me on but no one else i want people to play to.
and if you can maybe help me with the stuff i really need help on.
thanks for helping me.

item.title: Need help with my server
item.dc:creator: @robbert_ownz robbert ownz
item.description:
@robbert_ownz wrote:

since i got my pimpscape server source i have been playing it but i had many things i have wanted to do like:

-pk zone.
-make admin-mod bases.
-have people join my server.
-how to make walls and doors.
-make a new training spot.
-how to change my pimpscape to different name.

and i know how to make people go to my bases but it doesnt work i dont know my router and when i go on address bar and type 192.168.1.1 or 192.168.2.1 it never works i dont know whats wronge mostly i want to have people join my server and make admin spots and mod spots and deffinetly change pimpscape to a different name because when ever i logg on to my server it says welcome to PimpScape and i want it to say a different thing.

so if anyone can help please help plz im new i can logg on to my server well its actually pimpscape server and it lets me on but no one else i want people to play to.

and if you can maybe help me with the stuff i really need help on.

thanks for helping me.
